text: thæ̂cring brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā (thī̀thæ̂ cring) nận khụ̄x brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā t̀x xạllxḥˌ læa rx sūl k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ læa meụ̄̀x phwk k̄heā mā rwm kạn xyū̀ kạb k̄heā (muḥạmmạd) nı kickār thī̀ s̄ảkhạỵ phwk k̄heā ca mị̀ p̄hla xxk pị cnkẁā phwk k̄heā ca k̄hx xnuỵāt cāk k̄heā (muḥạmmạd) s̄eīy k̀xn thæ̂cring brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ k̄hx xnuỵāt t̀x cêā nận k̄heā h̄el̀ā nận khụ̄x brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ ṣ̄rạthṭhā t̀x xạllxḥˌ læa rx sūl k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ dạngnận meụ̄̀x phwk k̄heā k̄hx xnuỵāt t̀x cêā pheụ̄̀x kickār bāng xỳāng k̄hxng phwk k̄heā læ̂w k̆ cng xnuỵāt kæ̀ p̄hū̂ thī̀ cêā phụng pras̄ngkh̒ nı h̄mū̀ phwk k̄heā t̄heid læa cng k̄hx xp̣hạy t̀x xạllxḥˌ h̄ı̂ kæ̀ phwk k̄heā thæ̂ cring xạllxḥˌ nận thrng pĕn p̄hū̂ xp̣hạy p̄hū̂ mettā s̄emx
